title: Mobile Learning Content Quality Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency with mobile learning platforms and elementary science education experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning course for in-service elementary school teachers to analyze and design quality elements of mobile learning content for science classes.

learning_goals: Learners can apply and analyze five quality evaluation criteria for mobile learning content to real-world cases.
Learners can propose three or more content modification strategies considering learner characteristics (gender/technical proficiency).
Learners can create content production guidelines for a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) learning environment within an LMS context.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
